A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time fan I felt betrayed by what was done with Luke's character\, manipulated by Lea's death fake out\, baffeled by a slow space chase that made absolutely no sense\, and let down by all the stupid unfunny slapstick comedy. I love Star Wars but this was by far the worst of the movies\, even worse the TPM. The good scenes were great but they couldn't save this film. The Force Awakens was great\, but this follow up undid or ought right dismissed what was set up in that movie. It made me feel the way I felt when I saw Alien 3...
